12:     def initialize(env = {})
13:       env = Rails.application.env_defaults.merge(env) if defined?(Rails.application)
14:       super(DEFAULT_ENV.merge(env))

16:       self.host        = 'test.host'

Public Instance methods
accept=(mime_types)

[ show source ]

      # File actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/testing/test_request.rb, line 67
67:     def accept=(mime_types)
68:       @env.delete('action_dispatch.request.accepts')
69:       @env['HTTP_ACCEPT'] = Array(mime_types).collect { |mime_types| mime_types.to_s }.join(",")
70:     end

delete_nil_values!()

[ show source ]

      # File actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/testing/test_request.rb, line 83
83:       def delete_nil_values!
84:         @env.delete_if { |k, v| v.nil? }
85:       end
write_cookies!()

[ show source ]

      # File actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/testing/test_request.rb, line 77
77:       def write_cookies!
78:         unless @cookies.blank?
79:           @env['HTTP_COOKIE'] = @cookies.map { |name, value| "#{name}=#{value};" }.join(' ')
80:         end
81:       end
